mods.abstract: WSM program Saturday Social, unknown broadcast date, part 1. Personnel include Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host, performer), the Village Four (performers), Little Jimmy Dickens (performer), Dale Potter (performer), Judy Martin (performer), and Jamup & Honey (performers). Also mentioned as being on the program but not featured in this part is Zeb Turner.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
